fr.univ_lille1.fil.coo.courriers.letters

Class Letter<T extends Content>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ_lille1.fil.coo.courriers.letters.Letter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the content used in the letter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexLetter, DecoratorLetter, PromissoryNote, SimpleLetter

    public abstract class Letter<T extends Content>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent the base of a letter
